product_code: See Signature Floors website for specific SKU number
product_description: Static carpet tile collection embodies a blend of style and functionality catering to diverse needs.
recyclable_offcuts_description: Offcuts can be used in other areas of the installation. The half cut of a tile or plank can be used to begin the next row of tiles. Half cut tiles can be retained as back stock for future maintenance.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Transport emissions are minimised by maximising pallet capacity and using specialist flooring industry freighters, ensuring efficient deliveries with economies of scale. Planned routes to known flooring contractors further streamline logistics, while our focus on reducing impacts through considered product design during development stage also helps lower transport emissions.
minimisation_design_strategy: Ashlar or brick will result in least wastage. Less colour/sku combinations will also result in less uninstalled wastage unless full cartons are calculated into the tile layout.
specific_installation_methods: Product is to be installed using pressure sensitive adhesive or carpet tile connectors so there is no permanent adhesion to the substrate to allow for easy pull up. On Comfi Bak and Flexi Bak products which have a PET non-woven layer, the pressure sensitive adhesive needs adequate time to tack-off prior to installing the carpet tiles. Failure to do so can create a stronger than necessary bond making it difficult to pull up the tiles without damage.
type_of_packaging: Recycled cardboard cartons, timber pallets, clear plastic wrap shipping film.

minimisation_design_strategy: Ashlar or brick will result in least wastage. Less colour/sku combinations will also result in less uninstalled wastage unless full cartons are calculated into the tile layout.
specific_installation_methods: Product is to be installed using pressure sensitive adhesive or carpet tile connectors so there is no permanent adhesion to the substrate to allow for easy pull up. On Comfi Bak and Flexi Bak products which have a PET non-woven layer, the pressure sensitive adhesive needs adequate time to tack-off prior to installing the carpet tiles. Failure to do so can create a stronger than necessary bond making it difficult to pull up the tiles without damage.
type_of_packaging: Recycled cardboard cartons, timber pallets, clear plastic wrap shipping film.

On Comfi Bak and Flexi Bak products which have a PET non-woven layer, the pressure sensitive adhesive needs adequate time to tack-off prior to installing the carpet tiles. Failure to do so can create a stronger than necessary bond making it difficult to pull up the tiles without damage.
type_of_packaging: Recycled cardboard cartons, timber pallets, clear plastic wrap shipping film.

product_code: See Signature Floors website for specific SKU number
product_description: Earth II features a SDN fibre and a low multi-level-loop that resists crushing and wear.
recyclable_offcuts_description: Offcuts can be used in other areas of the installation. The half cut of a tile or plank can be used to begin the next row of tiles. Half cut tiles can be retained as back stock for future maintenance.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Transport emissions are minimised by maximising pallet capacity and using specialist flooring industry freighters, ensuring efficient deliveries with economies of scale. Planned routes to known flooring contractors further streamline logistics, while our focus on reducing impacts through considered product design during development stage also helps lower transport emissions.
minimisation_design_strategy: Ashlar or brick will result in least wastage. Less colour/sku combinations will also result in less uninstalled wastage unless full cartons are calculated into the tile layout.

On Comfi Bak and Flexi Bak products which have a PET non-woven layer, the pressure sensitive adhesive needs adequate time to tack-off prior to installing the carpet tiles. Failure to do so can create a stronger than necessary bond making it difficult to pull up the tiles without damage.
